TopicTitle: [Swe][Eng] My Fail Attempt at an Orion Launch [Modded]

Articles.Content:
[Eng.]

I am new at this and have learned fast! I have played Kerbal Space Program since 0.15 and have enjoyed greatly. In light of NASA's recent Orion test flight, I have decide finally post pictures of my own! But it did not go so well. :/ I will show both translation to Swedish and English through, I am trying to not forget my own language while I am overseas.

Wow! That is a terrific recreation! Also, in a couple of pictures PlanetShine really makes the view awesome. I really should recreate Orion myself someday...

Oh, and welcome to the forums!
so,i assume... staging error? or the classic unplanned rapid dissasembly?
